title: Graphical symbols for use in radio communication
abstract: The Board of Directors of the Institute, at its meeting of March 14, approved for transmittal to A. S. A. for approval as a Tentative American Standard “Graphical symbols for use in Radio communication.” This report has been available since April 1929 in pamphlet form as No. 17g3 in the A. I. E. E. series of reports on Standards.
